sentences.en: " Wen - wan, don't tell him,'said Hsin - mei in a haughty, jealous tone.
sentences.cn: 辛楣 又骄又妒道:“文纨, 不要告诉他. ”

sentences.en: A haughty girl is always unpopular at school.
sentences.cn: 骄傲的女孩子在学校常常不受人欢迎.

sentences.en: Arthur said, in a haughty tone.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟说, 声调显得盛气凌人.

sentences.en: He gave me a haughty look and walked away.
sentences.cn: 他向我摆出傲慢的表情后走开.

sentences.en: He had an air of haughty aloofness.
He spoke in a haughty tone.
He was at the same time haughty, reserved, and fastidious.
sentences.cn: 他为人兼有傲慢 、 含蓄和爱挑剔的性子.

sentences.en: I laughed aloud as the yolks of their eyeballs rolled toward us in haughty rivalry.
sentences.cn: 他们冲着我们翻翻白眼,一副傲慢争先的神气,我看了忍不住放声大笑.

sentences.en: If Catherine had been frigid the night before, today she was haughty.
sentences.cn: 如果说昨天晚上凯瑟琳举止僵硬的话, 今天晚上可以说是态度傲慢.

sentences.en: Miss Pybus said she was cold and haughty.
sentences.cn: 皮不斯小姐说她冷若冰霜,不把人放在眼里.

sentences.en: That fellow was so haughty that I was obliged to set him down.
sentences.cn: 那家伙是如此傲慢无礼,我不得不训斥他一顿.

sentences.en: The English have continued to show and to see themselves - islanders, haughty, puzzled.
sentences.cn: 英国人一直就表现为岛民,也看到自己确实是岛民, 傲慢 、 困惑.

sentences.en: The haughty Ione burst into passionate tears.
sentences.cn: 高傲的伊俄涅伤心地痛哭起来.

sentences.en: They were displeased with her haughty airs.
sentences.cn: 他们讨厌她高傲的派头.

trans.tran_cn: 傲慢的，骄傲的，目中无人的，自大的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a proud unfriendly way
